title: Routes and timings, Indian Ocean currents, winds

content.prompt: The particular routes and timings of the voyages depicted on the maps best reflect which of the following characteristics of Omani merchants?

choices.label: Their Islamic ritual observances, which made travel difficult during the fasting period of Ramadan
Their advanced knowledge of Indian Ocean currents and monsoon wind patterns
Their need to avoid the routes traveled by the faster and better-armed Portuguese trading ships
Their control of the sources of grain needed by Chinese and East African cities

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
